English.Text: They are desperate for help and accept your proposal. Your diplomat pressures the strangers more than she reassures them, and her pragmatic approach to the problem manages to convince them. About a third of the sick embark on your ship whereas the remaining sailors huddle together to share the meagre food that was hunted for them. Going back and forth between the closest harbour and the trapped ship drains your crew and your time, but the rescued men are indefinitely grateful.
